bridge-type.label: WMBus Stick
bridge-type.description: The WMBus bridge represents the USB stick used to receive WMBus messages. There are three different sticks supported by the underlying jMBus library: Amber Wireless AMB8465-M, Radiocrafts RC1180-MBUS and IMST iM871A-USB

parameter.name: serialDevice
parameter.label: Serial device
parameter.description: The name of the serial device (e.g. /dev/ttyUSB0 or COM5).

parameter.name: radioMode
parameter.description: Radio mode to operate the WMBus radio module on.
parameter.label: Radio mode

parameter.name: startupDelay
parameter.description: Delay the startup of the serial connection for this many seconds. Use to avoid race conditions with e.g. Z-Wave binding. Set to 0 to deactivate waiting.
parameter.label: Startup Delay

parameter.name: deviceIDFilter
parameter.description: List of device IDs to filter during receive. If empty, all received devices will be handled, if at least one ID is set, only messages from this device will be handled.
parameter.label: Device Filter
